  • Constructor Details

    • LeaderDevelopCard

      public LeaderDevelopCard​(int level, int victoryPoints, int faithOutput, Color color, ResourceAmount[] cost, ResourceAmount[] input, ResourceAmount[] output, int id)
      It instantiates a new DevelopCard, after the activation of a LevTwoLeader effect.
      Parameters:
      level - : it specifies the level of the card.
      victoryPoints - : it specifies the victory points given by the card.
      faithOutput - : it specifies the faith output of the card.
      color - : it specifies the color of the card.
      cost - : it specifies the cost of the card (in order to buy it).
      input - : it specifies the input requested to activate the production of the card.
      output - : it specifies the output produced by the card.

  • Method Details

    • activateProduction

      public int activateProduction​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> map, ResourceAmount[] strongbox, java.util.List<ResourceAmount> deposits, ResourceAmount[] strongboxOutput) throws InvalidActionException
      Method to activate a production on a Leader Develop Card
      Overrides:
      activateProduction in class DevelopCard
      Parameters:
      map - : the map indicates which resource and from where you want to take it, to start a production
      strongbox - : indicates the reference to the strongbox
      deposits - : indicates the reference to the deposits
      strongboxOutput - : indicates the output strongbox, which contains the resource that has been produced
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException
